law.text: At any time within two (2) years after approval by the convening authority of a court-martial sentence the accused may petition the adjutant general for a new trial on grounds of newly discovered evidence or fraud in the court-martial.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 75, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 48. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 68, effective July 1, 1954.
